abstracts.cdata!:
The project aims to address immediate
            needs for quality improvement in basic education, and to
            establish the policy and institutional frameworks for
            longer-term sector development.  Specifically, the project
            will:  (a) develop and implement new curricula,
            instructional materials and pedagogical support systems in
            primary and lower secondary education; (b) lay the
            foundation for a sustainable construction program for
            primary and lower secondary schools; (c) establish systems
            of data collection and analysis to support sector management
            and strategic planning; and (d) strengthen institutional
            capacities in educational administrative and management at
            the central and local levels.  To carry out these
            activities, the project will finance civil works, furniture,
            equipment, instructional materials, training, technical
            assistance, and project management and operations.
